reviews.customers_say: Customers like the dress's fit, with one noting it hits below the knees, and appreciate its comfort with pockets, beautiful patterns, and good quality. The colors are lovely, and they like the side slit pockets. The fabric quality receives mixed reviews, with some praising it while others find it cheap. Customers disagree on the sizing accuracy. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I bought a size up for a loose fit
items.body: Very pretty colors, just like in the picture. I have three other variations of this dress and I like them all. They are cool and loose and comfortable. I live in the tropics, so many fabrics are not comfortable here. These dresses work just fine for feeling good and looking good. Read more
items.author: Chriss

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfortable
items.body: Very cute and comfortable. Perfect for quick donning, lounging around home now that I’m retired. When my bad back acts up, it’s nice to wear something without a tight waist, and still feel cute. Nice comfortable fit. Just machine wash and dry; no problem, no iron. I bought three, different colors, all cute. Read more
items.author: KP

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Day to Evening Comfortable Soft Summer Dress
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I'm 65, 5'5 (shrinking), 191 (increasing), XL (prefer roominess). Silky soft and great flow. Vibrant colors and clear design. Fabric is not transparent when the sun is behind it. Great weight for summer, early fall, and late spring. Round neckline. Sleeves go midway to elbow and are loose. Side pockets are not cell phone deep but adequate for tissues, lipstick, small items. Length is just about the knee and when sitting it does not expose much leg. It is very comfortable in its loose fitting design and perfect for work, beach, evening out. It does wrinkle but hang it in the bathroom while showering and it loosens those wrinkles. A quick steam tumble in the dryer works well also. All in all I really like the dress and the price is right. Several designs or solids make it a great find. Read more
items.author: Dblivy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress
items.body: This dress is soft and nice. I'm a plus girl with body and i got a 3X plus. It's fits nicely. Its not tight. Room to breath and my favorite part ITS HAS POCKETS!! OMG and the price was amazing. I will be ordering more. Read more
items.author: Yamesse Lacy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight Summer Staple
items.body: Cute little summer dress! Perfect length on me about 2–3 fingers above the knee, so not too short and not frumpy. Super easy to throw on (pullover style), comfy, and lightweight. I can wear it to the beach or even just running to the grocery store and still feel put-together. For reference, I’m 5’7” and around 175 lbs, and the Large fit great. Read more
items.author: Miriam Torano

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good price and a big selection of designs and colors.
items.body: Didn't care for the fabric and hoped sleaves would be a little longer. Ended up returning it. Read more
items.author: Cathie L.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars beautiful and comfortable
items.body: Love this dress, so comfortable! I am a 2X so I ordered the 3X because I don't like them tight and this fits fine. My only complaint is that the pockets are too short and my cell phone falls out of them. Love the color, and it looks very flattering, even on a larger figure. There is no waistline which is great because I am short waisted and a lot of time the waist hits on my hips instead. I will probably get a couple more of these in different colors. Read more
items.author: Elizabeth Field

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful dress!
items.body: Love this dress! I have ordered 4 others. They fit great. They hang nicely not clingy. They are so comfy. I get so many compliments when I wear one of them to church. I ordered costume jewelry, a necklace and earrings, that is a color in the dress and it makes the perfect touch pulling the outfit together. Read more
items.author: slb1616

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue Boho, Colorful Tie Dye, Pink Floral, Black Butterflies, Bohemian Blue, Dark Blue Tie Dye, Black Sun Star, Red Wave Point, 01 Navy Blue, Black Catkins Flower, Apricot Floral, Black Red Boho, Pink Trees, Green Flowers. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
